ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Coda: The Signal
ComicInfo.Summary:
War for the Core! Deep within Cybertron, the ultimate weapon to kill all Transformers is about to be activated! Meanwhile, Elita One plans to stop the weapon—by killing every human on Cybertron! Either way, looks like some species on Cybertron is going down unless Optimus Prime and Scarlett can save the day…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Freddie E. Williams II & Jeremy Colwell | 1 | B | Cover B | Max Dunbar & Ander Zarate | 2 | C | Cover C | Alex Ronald | 3 | D | Cover D | Rob Duenas | 4 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover A | Jay Fosgitt | 5 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover B | Davidé Fabbri & Thomas Deer | 6 | RI-C | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Cover C | Ilias Kyriazis | 7 |
